riddles.riddle: I have cities, but no houses live there. I have mountains, but no trees grow there. I have water, but no fish swim there. What am I?
riddles.hint: You might unfold me or look at me on a wall.

riddles.riddle: The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?
riddles.hint: Think about walking on a sandy beach.

riddles.riddle: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with the wind. What am I?
riddles.hint: Try shouting in a canyon.

riddles.riddle: I have keys, but no locks. I have space, but no room. You can enter, but can't go inside. What am I?
riddles.hint: You're probably looking at one right now.

riddles.riddle: What has hands but can't clap?
riddles.hint: It tells you something important every moment of the day.

riddles.riddle: I'm tall when I'm young and short when I'm old. What am I?
riddles.hint: I give light and slowly melt away.

riddles.riddle: What has a head and a tail but no body?
riddles.hint: You flip me to make a decision.

riddles.riddle: What can travel around the world while staying in a corner?
riddles.hint: You stick me on an envelope.

riddles.riddle: I have teeth but cannot bite. What am I?
riddles.hint: You use me every morning to look presentable.

riddles.riddle: What gets wetter the more it dries?
riddles.hint: You reach for me after a bath.

riddles.riddle: I can be cracked, made, told, and played. What am I?
riddles.hint: I make people laugh.

riddles.riddle: What has one eye but cannot see?
riddles.hint: You thread me to do some sewing.

riddles.riddle: I have a neck but no head. What am I?
riddles.hint: You might drink from me.

riddles.riddle: The person who makes it, sells it. The person who buys it never uses it. The person who uses it never knows it. What is it?
riddles.hint: Think about something used after a person passes away.

riddles.riddle: What has many rings but no fingers?
riddles.hint: Cut me down and count my age.

riddles.riddle: I follow you everywhere but you can never catch me. What am I?
riddles.hint: I appear when the sun is shining.

riddles.riddle: What can you hold in your right hand but never in your left hand?
riddles.hint: The answer is part of your own body.

riddles.riddle: What begins with T, ends with T, and has T in it?
riddles.hint: I hold a warm beverage inside me.

riddles.riddle: I am not alive, but I grow. I don't have lungs, but I need air. What am I?
riddles.hint: I am hot and dangerous if not controlled.

riddles.riddle: What has a bed but never sleeps, and has a mouth but never eats?
riddles.hint: I flow through landscapes and sometimes flood.
